SCTX:
begin SpellCast

short doOnce
short istriggered

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	return
endif

set istriggered to "shrine_trigger".triggered

if  ( istriggered > 0 )
	cast "fireball" player
	set istriggered to istriggered - 1
	set "shrine_trigger".triggered to istriggered
	set doOnce to 1
endif

end
